About Beyond Mentors
Community Care Initiatives (BMCCI)

BMCCI is a non-profit organization committed to transforming lives in Nigeria by empowering communities socially, economically, and educationally to break the cycle of poverty, with a focus on Northern Nigeria

Our History








BMCCI was founded in 2007 with a vision to uplift marginalized
communities by addressing poverty’s root causes. Registered as
a social enterprise in 2013 and an NGO in 2017, BMCCI has since
grown into a vital force for change in Nigeria. Today, it
empowers women, children, and youth through programs focused
on financial literacy, business opportunities, and education,
fostering resilience and sustainable development across communities.







Mission, Vision,
and Values

Our Mission

Our mission is to create pathways out of poverty by building conducive learning spaces, promoting financial empowerment, and fostering community support networks. Through innovative programs, we equip individuals and communities with the skills they need to thrive.

Our Partners

Our customers accomplish amazing things every day. They work to find cures to cancer, travel to space, build tomorrow's innovations, and beyond.

Join Us ›

Ready to Make a Difference?

We aim to prevent and eradicate poverty from its root in Nigeria,
particularly in Northern Nigeria.
